title: Rengar Tips?
body: Outside of knowing to use E while leaping, I know little to nothing about Rengar. I've tried him jungle and I'm considering top and jungle hasn't proven too successful.

replies.body: dont buy mobility boots. buy CDR boots and go for 40% CDR. 5% from runes, 15% from boots, 10% from yomuus, 10% from jungle item. as long as you have the yomuus you dont need mobility boots. after only having your jungle item and boots, youll have 30% cdr at like the 15 min mark.

Ok so I play a lot of rengar. 
1. Use night hunter skin and put your hood down for swag points (Ctrl + 2)
2. Use your q as an auto attack reset
3. When you have 5 stacks, ult. Before you jump on the enemy use Youmoos and Empowered Q. AS you jump use W, Hydra, and E (e only if you can one shot, otherwise save to slow their escape) and Q again once you land.
4. When jungling you can use empowered W and normal W but use them separately not back to back so that you get the longest time with the armor and mr boosts. 
5. Use Scuttle to stack ferocity.
6. Mid game build: Rangers (warrior), Hydra, Youmoos, Last Whisper, Mobis
7. End game build/Fed build: Infinity Edge, Hydra, Youmoos, Last Whisper, Tri Force, Phantom Dancer.
8. Top lane rengar. Take ignite and hide in bushes. only auto creeps when you have q up and when you get to 5 stacks go into bush and empowered q leap to enemy then q again and spam other abilities and ignite. Usually ends in first blood. Also works at the enemy red buff if you are on blue side. 
9. Always target squishies and get upgraded red trinket to see enemy wards.

"A true hunter never rests"
